achievements: Developed influential theories on power, knowledge, and discourse
Wrote key works such as 'Madness and Civilization' and 'Discipline and Punish'
Critiqued institutions like prisons, mental hospitals, and schools
Won three consecutive Ballon d'Or awards (1983-1985)
Led France to victory in the 1984 European Championship
Served as president of UEFA from 2007 to 2015
